analysis.description:
UbecoinICO.refundMoney (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#289-293) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(refundAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#290-293)

UbecoinICO.withdrawFunds (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#320-322) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- WITHDRAW_WALLET.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#321-322)

Ubecoin.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#330-331) shadows:
	- StandardToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#61)

Reentrancy in UbecoinICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#211-242):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#216-217)
	- tokensAndRefund = calcMultiStage() (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#222-223)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#235-236)
	- investments (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#228-230)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#235-236)

UbecoinICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#211-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rewardToken.transfer(beneficiary,boughtTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#236-239)

Reentrancy in UbecoinICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#211-242):
	External calls:
	- currentTokensAmount = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#216-217)
	- tokensAndRefund = calcMultiStage() (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#222-223)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSold (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#227-228)

Reentrancy in UbecoinICO.calcMultiStage (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#245-278):
	External calls:
	- undistributedTokens = availableTokens() (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#251)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#277)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#274-275)
	- soldOnStage (/unique_chucks/18/0x484fe52e206665039d66f8098102d3299d243e26.sol#277)
